name: Super Jump Girl
description:
Super Jump Girl

Help an tiny girl to get her little cat back in this retro like platformer. Collect coins and pickups to beat all tricky levels and reach your goal. Classic difficulty with limited number of lives.

8-Bit jump and run with classic gameplay! Retro graphics and sounds with nostalgic chiptune tracks! Handcrafted levels! No IAP just pixel! Without Ads! With Gamepad & Touch support! Inspired from „The Great Giana Sisters“ and „Super Mario Bros“ !

Controls:

Left/Right | Move

Space | Jump

Ctrl | Fire

Enter | Start/Pause

T | Toggle Touch

F11 | Fullscreen
